Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Dude \Dude\, n. A kind of dandy; especially, one characterized by an ultrafashionable style of dress and other affectations. [Recent] [1913 Webster]
The social dude who affects English dress and English drawl. --The American. [1913 Webster]
dude n : a man who is much concerned with his dress and appearance [syn: {dandy}, {fop}, {gallant}, {sheik}, {beau}, {swell}, {fashion plate}, {clotheshorse}]
